item.title: SeReNa-SEA
item.description:
The Divine Tragedy of Securing the Sacred: Security, Religion, and Nationalism in Southeast Asia

  • Fieldworks (relating to the project)
  • Public Engagements (relating to the project)
  • A Case For Godless States (monograph)
  • Why Nation-States Persist (journal manuscript)
  • The Divine Tragedy of Securing the Sacred (journal manuscript)

A EU Horizon 2020 Marie Sk≈Çodowska-Curie Project: 1 Mar 2019 – 28 Feb 2021. See the SeReNa-SEA project factsheet.
